name: Upsilon
description:
Time is looping again... You are an astronaut on an abandoned space station stuck in a time loop. You must get yourself to the escape pod to escape this terrible fate. Anything you interact with stays that way, doors stay open and boxes stay where you put them in between time loops. For Ludum Dare 47.

A & D to move

Space to jump

E to activate levers

RMB to pick up a box

LMB to drop the box you are carrying.

 Ludum Dare Page
